Name: Long Island Spiced Tea
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Cola (e.g. Coca-Cola or Pepsi)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
TOP with cola and briefly stir.
Garnish with lime wedge on rim.
Review: A contemporary spicy twist on the American classic Long Island Iced Tea.
Nutrition: One serving of Long Island Spiced Tea contains 219 calories
